articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Apple supplier Foxconn buys huge site in Bengaluru - Mint
articles.description: Apple is looking to diversify production away from China. Foxconn has acquired the 1.2 million-square-metre (13 million-square-foot) land in Devanahalli, near the airport for Indian tech hub Bengaluru.
articles.content: Apple supplier Foxconn has bought a huge tract of land on the outskirts of Indian tech hub Bengaluru, the company said in a filing Tuesday. Coming at a time when Apple is looking to diversify product… [+2066 chars]

articles.title: New technique generates highest-resolution maps of the 3D genome - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Much of the human genome is made of regulatory regions that control which genes are expressed at a given time within a cell.
articles.content: Much of the human genome is made of regulatory regions that control which genes are expressed at a given time within a cell. Those regulatory elements can be located near a target gene or up to 2 mil… [+8554 chars]
